Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Ke kaloku lowo wenza izenzo ezilungileyo lo gama ekholwa, imizamo yakhe ayiyi kuphikwa, yaye inene Thina SingabaBhali bayo
Akuvumelekanga nasiphi na isixeko kwesazitshabalalisayo ukuba zingaphinda zibuyele (ebomini) kwakhona
De uYa’jûj (uGogi) noMa’jûj (uMagogi) bakhululwe baze behle kuzo zonke iinduli

Ke kaloku isithembiso senene siza kuya sisondela, kananjalo niya kuwabona amehlo abangakholwayo ejamile ndlaa ngoloyiko (besithi): “Yeha kuthi! Inene thina zanga sikunanze oku nakanye thina sasingabenzi bobubi.”
Inene nina bangakholwayo noko nikunqulayo ngaphandle koAllâh, niya kuba ziinkuni (zoMlilo) wesiHogo yaye niya kungeniswa kuso
Ukuba ngaba ezi zithixo bezingoothixo (bokwenyani) bebengazi kungeniswa kuso (isiHogo), yaye bonke baya kuhlala apho kuso (ngonaphakade)
Kuso, apho baya kuphefumla ngesingqala nomgqumo ukanti phakathi apho abayi kuva nto (ngeendlebe)
Inene bona abo umvuzo wabo olungileyo uya kuba uphumile kuThi. Ke bona kuwo (uMlilo wesiHogo) baya kususwa babe kude lee
Abayi kuva nesincinane isandi sawo (uMlilo wesiHogo), lo gama baya kuba behleli apho imiphefulo yabo inqwenela ukuhlala khona
Uloyiko olukhulu (loMhla wokugqibela) aluyi kubaxhalabisa bona, yaye iingelosi ziya kudibana nabo, (zisithi): “Le yiloo Mini yenu enanithenjiswe ngayo”

IMini apho Siya kulisonga izulu libe ngathi liphepha lokubhala elisongwayo. Njengoko Saqala indalo yokuqala, Siya kuyiphinda kwakhona. Sisithembiso esisisibophelelo kuThi (eso). Inene, Thina Siya kukwenza oko
Ke kaloku Sele Sibhalile eNcwadini (yeeNdumiso) emva kokuba sele kukhankanyiwe okokuba ilizwe (lasePaladesi) liya kudliwa ilifa zizicaka zaM ezingamalungisa
Inene kule (‘Kur’ân) kukho umyalezo kubantu bonqulo
Kananjalo wena (Muhammad) aSikuthumelelanga nto yimbi ngaphandle kokuba ube yinceba kwi-’Alamin (ebantwini bonke nakwindalo ngokubanzi)
Yithi, “Kutyhiliwe kum okokuba uThixo wenu nguThixo Omnye (jwi); ingaba ke nina niza kuba ngawo amaMuslim?”
Kodwa ke ukuba bayatshikila bafulathele, yithi wena, “Mna ndivakalisile kuni nonke ngokulinganayo. Kananjalo andazi nokuba kusekude okanye sele kukufutshane na oko nithenjiswe ngako. (kusisohlwayo)
Inene Yena Uyakwazi okuthethwayo, Ekwazi noko nikufihlayo
Yaye andazi mna, mhlawumbi kusenokwenzeka ukuba kuthi kanti luvavanyo lwenu (olu) nolonwabo lwethutyana.”
(UMprofeti) wathi yena: “Nkosi yam, gweba (phakathi kwethu) ngenyaniso. Kananjalo iNkosi yethu nguSolubabalo, lolwaKhe uncedo olufunwayo ngokuchasene noko nikuchazayo6.”
